snippet: Morgan Stanley is in the early stages of a strategic review of its private banking business in Switzerland, and the options it is exploring include selling the unit, according to a person familiar with the matter.
abstract: Morgan Stanley is in the early stages of a strategic review of its private banking business in Switzerland, and the options it is exploring include selling the unit, according to a person familiar with the matter.

headline.main: Morgan Stanley Is Said to Weigh Sale of Its Swiss Private Bank
